_sText:
The map themes are copied from many different maps. Some of those were made by the original mapper in my map and some I tried to recreate myself. Here the list of all the map themes that I used in chronological order:

[original map]: [original mapper]/[rebuilder]

surf_cinnamon:                  wayne/wayne
surf_jusched_beta1:          smashed/wayne
surf_forbidden_tomb:       Rhapsodia/wayne
surf_elysium:                      Sacred/wayne
surf_sandbricks:                 vay/vay
surf_(not_so_)zen:              Mr.25/wayne
surf_sinsane_ksf:                b0at/wayne
surf_shodan:                       Spy Complex/Spy Complex
surf_sinister_evil:                Rambjoe+Kiiru/wayne
surf_spectra:                       Hork/Hork
surf_pagoda:                       pretzL/pretzL
surf_not_so_quick:             Sam/Sam
surf_axiom:                         Krealington/Krealington
surf_runewords:                biji/biji

Map info:

Linear
Tier 6
1 Bonus

sv_maxvelocity 10000
Needs to be at least 4000 so you don't have to cheat pagoda part.

I didn't include the bonus in the video or spend much time doing it because I just want it to be nothing but a bonus. Nowadays it feels like map get made to have as many bonuses as possible but i spend so much time doing the surf of the actual map that I rather have people play this for the sake of the map or not at all. I hope you like it.

If any of the original map designers wants me to take this down then hit me up on steam (wayne3288).

Your IQ needs to be at least 200 to understand that the name of this map is ironic.

Much love
